name: Pumpkin Jump (Magicalbat)
description:
Play this game to save just one pumpkin for to have them again next year. All the pumpkins you leave behind are sacrificed and become jack o' lanterns.

Credit:

Song - SpiderDave: https://opengameart.org/users/spiderdave

Code, Art - Magicalbat(myself): https://magicalbat.itch.io

Made with Pygame: https://www.pygame.org/news

Controls:

Left, Right -> Move

c / Up -> Jump

x -> Discard pumpkin

r -> Restart

ESC -> Pause

F11 / CTRL + f -> Toggle fullscreen

m -> Toggle music

s -> Toggle sfx
